thread.title: BRIEF-FTD Companies Announces Delay In The Release Of Its Fourth Quarter And Full-Year 2017 Financial Results

title: BRIEF-FTD Companies Announces Delay In The Release Of Its Fourth Quarter And Full-Year 2017 Financial Results
text: 18 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-FTD Companies Announces Delay In The Release Of Its Fourth Quarter And Full-Year 2017 Financial Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   FTD Companies Inc: * FTD COMPANIES, INC. ANNOUNCES DELAY IN THE RELEASE OF ITS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * FTD COMPANIES - ‍DUE TO TIME REQUIRED TO PURSUE FINANCING INITIATIVES CO EXPERIENCED DELAY IN FILING FORM 10-K FOR YEAR ENDED DEC 31, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
